replies.body: why is that ur profile pic when it's clearly not you. is that what you wish you looked like?
replies.body_tagged: why is that ur profile pic when it's clearly not you. is that what you wish you looked like?

replies.body:
Well for starters, it's clearly superior to a 16x16 square of a very limited pixel palette. In a way, it's a bit of an old meme too; some people used to argue over my gender before I got on TS/Skype/etc. Also, it is a reminder of my time in Berzerk and my old teammates. And lastly, it's nice to look at.

Do I wish I looked like this?

....that's a loaded question.

.
